Innovation

Introduction to Innovation

Our Focus

We are committed to introducing that innovations that revolutionize widely prescribed pharmaceuticals with advanced delivery mechanisms to increase efficacy and accessibility.

Approach to Innovation

Guided by purpose,
driven to innovate.

01

Innovate Delivery

Our mission is to revolutionize the pharmaceutical market by developing advanced delivery mechanisms for widely prescribed drugs aimed at enhancing their efficacy and minimizing their side effects.

02

Enhance Experience

We are committed to simplifying medication routines for our customers by offering products that are easier to administer, aiming to improve adherence and outcomes in diabetes management.

03

Global Accessibility

Our goal is to distribute our innovative drugs worldwide, ensuring that patients across the globe have access to safer, more effective, and efficient diabetes treatment options.

Our Innovation

Our enteric coating technology is transforming the administration and delivery of existing drug families.

Raw material is extracted, concentrated and processed to powder

key component 1

Microencapsulation

A precision technique where active ingredients are encased in a polymer matrix, creating particles ranging from sub-microns to millimeters

Ensures targeted delivery and enhanced drug stability

key component 2

Enteric Coating

Our specialized coating technology strategically delivers medication to the intestine, bypassing stomach degradation

Significantly reduces gastrointestinal side effects and enhances bioavailability
Ready-to-use Medication

Products

Altanine’s proprietary coating can be used to create various methods of delivery for widely prescribed drugs

Just mix with water

Gummies

A chewable, candy-like alternative infused with medication, providing a pill-free experience. A friendly option for those averse to traditional pills.

Just mix with water

Crystal-Met

Convenient sachets of Metformin crystals designed to be mixed with water for an easy-to-drink solution. Ideal for patients who have difficulty swallowing pills.

Enhanced Inhaler Technology

Aspiration inhalers deliver medication directly to the lungs for faster relief and fewer systemic side effects, improving safety and efficacy.

Ease of use and customizable dosing improve patient compliance and outcomes.

impact on weight lose market

Altanine’s technology can dramatically change the 260bn global dollar weight-loss market.

Saxenda (Liraglutide)
  • Daily injection
  • Early weight loss treatment
  • Pervasive GI side effects
  • Patients “move on” due to side effects and daily injections.
Wegovy (semaglutide)
  • Reduce the column width of the each section.
  • Put Liraglutide on second line same as semaglutide.
  • GLP-1 - this needs to resemble the slide, it is our product and needs to stand out.
GLP-1 Oral Capsules
  • Altanine eliminates injections with proprietary oral capsule formulation
  • Represents significant improvement over existing oral versions of GLP-1 receptor antagonists
  • Oral capsules offer a cost-effective weight loss drug therapy compared to high price injectables.

Advancing Patient Care

Altanine’s proprietary process increases drug’s efficacy and improve patient experience

  • Patient-friendly treatment
  • Special patented enteric coating for targeted release
  • Enhanced bioavailability of the medication
  • Improved body absorption
  • Reduced gastrointestinal side effects
  • Lowers the necessary dosage of Metformin
